title: Engineer, Cloud Infrastructure
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Provide expertise on public cloud and enterprise technology.
- Design cloud architectures and migration approaches for customers.
- Serve as a technical advisor and troubleshoot issues.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.
- 6 years of experience in secure cloud solutions.
- Active U.S. Government Top Secret clearance with polygraph.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
- Containerization and orchestration technologies (e.g., GKE).
- Infrastructure provisioning and DevOps tools.

criteria.name: Industries
criteria.value: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet

title: Senior Software Engineer, AI/ML, YouTube
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Write and test product or system development code.  
• Collaborate on design and code reviews for best practices.  
• Debug and resolve product or system issues effectively.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.  
• 5 years programming experience in Python and C++.  
• 3 years experience with ML infrastructure and technologies.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Python and C++.  
• Machine Learning (ML) infrastructure.  
• Speech/audio and reinforcement learning technologies.

title: Data Center Infrastructure Electrical Engineer
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Execute electrical design and calculation packages for LV systems and UPS.  
• Review single-line diagrams and equipment submittals for compliance.  
• Support commissioning and troubleshooting of electrical infrastructure.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• Bachelor's degree in Electrical or Power Engineering or equivalent experience.  
• 10 years in mission-critical facility design and construction.  
• 8 years in electrical design for commercial or industrial facilities.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Power system analysis software (e.g., ETAP, SKM).  
• Low Voltage (LV) and Medium Voltage (MV) electrical systems.  
• National Electrical Code/International Electrotechnical Commission standards.

title: Software Engineer Lead, Network Demand Forecasting, Google Networking
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Drive technical strategy for network forecasting and demand generation.  
• Lead cross-functional projects from design to launch.  
• Mentor engineers and promote high-quality software development.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.  
• 8 years in software development; 5 years in cloud architecture.  
• Experience in technical leadership and distributed systems.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• General-purpose programming languages (e.g., Python, Go, Java).  
• Cloud infrastructure and large-scale data processing.  
• Statistical modeling and machine learning techniques.

title: Staff Software Engineer, Labs
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Provide technical leadership on high-impact projects.  
• Influence and coach a distributed team of engineers.  
• Manage project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables.  
• Design, develop, test, and enhance software solutions.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.  
• 8 years of software development experience.  
• 5 years of experience testing and launching software products.  
• 3 years in a technical leadership role.  

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:
• Master’s degree or PhD in a related field.  
• 8 years of experience with data structures/algorithms.  
• 3 years working on cross-functional projects.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Information retrieval and distributed computing.  
• Large-scale system design and networking.  
• Artificial intelligence and natural language processing.
